name: rest-rant
description: |   Method  |       Path                |          Purpose                                | |-----------|---------------------------|-------------------------------------------------| |   GET     |       '/'                 | Home page                                       | |   GET     | `/places`                 | Places index page                               | |   POST    | `/places`                 | Create new place                                | |   GET     | `/places/new`             | Form page for creating a new place              | |   GET     | `/places/:id`             | Details about a particlar place                 | |   PUT     | `/places/:id`             | Update a particular place                       | |   GET     | `/places/:id/edit`        | Form page for editing an existing place       |   |   DELETE  | `/places/:id`             | Delete a particular place                       | |   POST    | `/places/:id/rant`        | Create a rant (comment) about a particular place| |   DELETE  | `/places/:id/rant/:rantId`| Delete a rant (comment) about a particular place| |   GET     |   *                       | 404 page (matches any route not define above)|
